subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Donato Hanover was named the 7-5 favorite in the $610,000 Breeders Crown 3-year-old Colt Trot at the Meadowlands Racetrack on Saturday night despite drawing post No. 10, the worst possible slot for his final start before he retires to stud.
snippet: Donato Hanover was named the 7-5 favorite in the $610,000 Breeders Crown 3-year-old Colt Trot at the Meadowlands Racetrack on Saturday night despite drawing post No. 10, the worst possible slot for his final start before he retires to stud.
